pull.title: test: Split overly large util_tests.cpp file
pull.body:
The file has ~3kLOC and is slow to compile.

Fix both issues by splitting it. (On my machine the compilation goes from 25 seconds previously to 17+10 seconds for the two smaller files)

To review, `--color-moved=dimmed-zebra` can be used.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#26213](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26213) (univalue: Remove confusing getBool/isTrue/isFalse by MarcoFalke)
* [#26028](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26028) (More verbose warning for multiple network argument error. by amovfx)
* [#17783](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17783) (util: Fix -norpcwhitelist, -norpcallowip, and similar corner case behavior by ryanofsky)
* [#17581](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17581) (refactor: Remove settings merge reverse precedence code by ryanofsky)
* [#17580](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17580) (refactor: Add ALLOW_LIST flags and enforce usage in CheckArgFlags by ryanofsky)
* [#17493](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17493) (util: Forbid ambiguous multiple assignments in config file by ryanofsky)
* [#16545](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16545) (refactor: Implement missing error checking for ArgsManager flags by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Concept ACK

I successfully compiled the branch and ran the test on it.

I think some dependencies would be redundant and can be removed.

in `src/test/util_tests.cpp`
```
#include <test/util/logging.h>
#include <test/util/str.h>
```

and, in `src/test/argsman_tests.cpp`
